verbs.description: [ARG1: The annual migrant caravan] [V: grew] [ARG2: much bigger than expected] , and it triggered a negative response from Donald Trump that was much bigger than expected .

The annual migrant caravan grew much bigger than expected , and [ARG0: it] [V: triggered] [ARG1: a negative response from Donald Trump that was much bigger than expected] .
The annual migrant caravan grew much bigger than expected , and it triggered [ARG1: a negative response from Donald Trump] [R-ARG1: that] [V: was] [ARG2: much bigger than expected] .
The annual migrant caravan grew much bigger than expected , and it triggered a negative response from Donald Trump that was much bigger than [V: expected] .
